title: Create a social media growth tips website

requirements.text: Create a responsive, multi-section marketing website focused on "ways to help build your social media account" with clear navigation and scannable content.

quotes: Create me a website where people can press on a link leading them to my website and the website is about ways to help build your social media account

acceptanceCriteria: Home page loads without errors and is readable on mobile and desktop.
Site includes a top navigation and at least these sections: Hero/intro, Core growth tips, Platform-specific tips, Tools & resources, FAQ.
All user-facing text is in English.

requirements.text: Add practical growth guidance content covering: profile optimization, content strategy, consistency/scheduling, engagement/community, hashtags/SEO, analytics/iteration, and cross-promotion/collaboration.

quotes: the website is about ways to help build your social media account

acceptanceCriteria: Each listed topic is presented as a distinct subsection with bullet points or short paragraphs.
At least one actionable checklist is included (e.g., "Profile checklist" or "Weekly growth routine").

requirements.text: Ensure the site is easily shareable and accessible as a single public entry point (a clear landing route) with a prominent call-to-action button that scrolls to the tips/resources sections.

quotes: people can press on a link leading them to my website

acceptanceCriteria: Visiting the root route displays the landing page content.
Primary CTA button scrolls to the main tips section (or resources) and works on mobile and desktop.

requirements.text: Apply a coherent, distinct visual theme (colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) suitable for a social-media growth guide, and use it consistently across the site.

quotes: Create me a website ... about ways to help build your social media account

acceptanceCriteria: Consistent typographic scale (headings/body) and spacing across sections.
Theme avoids a default/unstyled look and is consistent across all pages/sections.
Do not use a blue+purple dominant palette unless explicitly requested later.

requirements.text: Add generated static images to improve visual polish (hero illustration and small section icons) and render them from frontend/public/assets/generated (no backend image serving).
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images exist under frontend/public/assets/generated and are referenced by the UI.
Images render crisply at common breakpoints without layout shift.

constraints: Use React + TypeScript with Tailwind and compose existing UI components; do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui.
Do not modify frontend immutable paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx.
Backend must remain single-actor Motoko architecture if any backend code is added; do not introduce additional backend services.
nonGoals: User-submitted comments, forums, chat, or real-time features

required: Modern flat hero illustration of a person growing social media metrics with abstract charts and icons (social-growth-hero.dim_1600x900.png)
Set of 6 minimalist outline-style icons: profile, calendar, engagement, hashtag, analytics, collaboration (social-icons-set.dim_512x512.png)
